timeline.message:
Added size field to EquipmentPart and MissingEquipmentPart.

Removed capacity field from LargeCraftAmmoBin to use size field instead.
Use size field when setting EquipmentPart name.
Fix Drone carrier control system and MASH equipment part costs.

timeline.body: Why is there no setter for size?
timeline.bodyText: Why is there no setter for size?
timeline.bodyHTML: Why is there no setter for size?
timeline.author: Windchild292

timeline.body:
Why even keep these, or at least not deprecate them?
Just temporary cause you don't want to make the change now to remove them? Or is it because they is no setter for size?

replies.bodyText: I considered that but in the context of a LargeCraftAmmoBin I think the getCapacity() alias is more intuitive. I deprecated Mounted::getCapacity because the concept of capacity doesn't make sense for Mounted in every context.
replies.author: neoancient
